New Records: Spain secured a 1-0 victory over Albania in their Euro 2024 match, marking their first win of the tournament and maintaining an unbroken defensive record with no goals conceded in the match.
Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the decisive goal for Spain in the 13th minute, giving his team the lead and ultimately the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Albania's coach Sylvinho expressed confidence in his team's ability to compete against Spain, despite expectations of a high-scoring match.
Post-Match Reflections: Sylvinho praised Albania's performance and left the match proud of their effort, despite the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw a young fan run onto the pitch and flares being lit, adding to the atmosphere despite the result.
